pr_title: Rename JVM functions supporting CDS for jdk 16

timeline.message:
Rename JVM functions supporting CDS for jdk 16

See
* 8253500: [REDO] JDK-8253208 Move CDS related code to a separate class

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: This isn't ideal, we'll have to remember to add java17, etc.
timeline.author: pshipton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,6 +64,10 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 			<group name="jdk15">
 				<include-if condition="spec.java15"/>
 			</group>
+			<group name="jdk15only">
+				<include-if condition="spec.java15"/>
+				<exclude-if condition="spec.java16"/>

replies.bodyText: No, spec.java16 means the same as JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 16.
replies.author: keithc-ca
